User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the Streak Keeper application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

currentStreak.description: The user's current consecutive streak of progress days.

longestStreak.description: The user's longest ever streak of progress days.

lastActivityDate.description: The date of the user's last recorded activity.

level.description: The user's current level based on their XP.

badges.description: A list of IDs for badges the user has earned.

DailyProgress.title: DailyProgress
DailyProgress.description: Represents a user's daily progress and learning activities.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DailyProgress entry.

date.description: The date for which the progress is recorded.

activity.description: Description of the learning activities completed on the specified date.

subject.description: The subject studied on the specified date.

progress.description: Hours studied. Can be a floating-point number.

Badge.title: Badge
Badge.description: Represents an unlockable achievement or badge.

description.description: A description of what the badge represents.

icon.description: The name of the Lucide icon to display for the badge.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information, including streak data. Path-based ownership ensures only the authenticated user can access their own data.

/users/{userId}/dailyProgress/{dailyProg.description: Stores daily progress records for each user. Path-based ownership ensures only the authenticated user can access their own data.
